content.title: Funeral Assistance- Haryana Silicosis Board
content.details: The scheme 'Funeral Assistance' is implemented by the Haryana Labour Welfare Board, Government of Haryana. Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹15,000/- is given to the dependent/nominee of a deceased worker, who was confirmed to have Silicosis by the Silicosis Diagnosis Board, Haryana, for performing the funerary rituals.
benefits: Financial assistance of ₹15,000/- is given to the dependent/nominee of the deceased worker for performing the funerary rituals.
eligibility: The applicant should be the dependent/nominee of the deceased worker.
The deceased worker should have been suffering from silicosis as confirmed by the Silicosis Diagnosis Board, Haryana.
The worker should have been employed in a factory or at a construction site.
content.application_process: Offline and Online - via CSCs. The applicant may visit the nearest Labour Office and collect the application form. The Application Performa may also be downloaded from the Official Website of the Labour Department Haryana. Fill out the application form with all required details, attach necessary documents, and submit it to the Assistant Director, Industrial Health of your concerned jurisdiction.
documents_required: Copy of Aadhaar Card of applicant
Identity Card of the deceased worker
Death Certificate/Post Mortem Report of the worker
Proof of relation with the deceased worker

faqs.question: Who implements the scheme?
faqs.answer: The scheme is implemented by the Haryana Labour Welfare Board, Government of Haryana.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to receive assistance under this scheme?
faqs.answer: The dependent or nominee of a deceased worker who was confirmed to have Silicosis by the Silicosis Diagnosis Board, Haryana, is eligible.

faqs.question: How much financial assistance is provided under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The scheme provides financial assistance of ₹15,000/-.

faqs.question: What is Silicosis?
faqs.answer: Silicosis is an incurable lung disease caused by inhaling silica dust, common in workplaces like stone crushers and mines.

faqs.question: Who confirms the diagnosis of Silicosis?
faqs.answer: The diagnosis of Silicosis is confirmed by the Silicosis Diagnosis Board, Haryana.

faqs.question: What is the purpose of the financial assistance provided under this scheme?
faqs.answer: The financial assistance is provided to help with the costs of performing funerary rituals for the deceased worker.

faqs.question: How can eligible applicants apply for the scheme benefits?
faqs.answer: Eligible applicants may visit the nearest Antyodaya Kendra or Labour Office and fill up the application form.
